name: Monkey match adventure - the super ape story
name_original: Monkey match adventure - the super ape story
description:
120 super tricky and most amazing levels spread out on a magical jungle match adventure
suitable for any age, young to old players love this game.

Swipe to match 3 or more, could not be more easier than this right?
Well, not only do we have the classic match 3 candy adventure game but we added tons of extra tricky tasks and obstacles in the game to challege your brain to the max!

Try in, you will most probaly be blown away with this super addictive match3 game of the year!

Playing games have never been more fun than this, so bring your extra charger along with you and load up the Monkey match adventure game today!
